name: Clap Clap Game!
description:
Clap clap game is a game inspired by recent government's initiative to show our appreciation to the frontline worker during the pandemic by clapping from our respective home. 

The game showcases various although not all occupations that are considered to be our every day heroes . Different people can be heroes for different people, and it is difficult to judge people just from their appearance alone. The original intention of the game is to make people reflect on their decision  if they judge people too quickly based on what they can see, and to realize that people's opinion can differ.

it has been a long time since we try to create a game, so we try to keep things simple. 

The game is made by two people: 

- Satrio Triatmoko - Programmer

- Devy Dwiastuti  - Artist


ding sound effect - https://www.freesoundslibrary.com/ding-sound-effect/
